channel.title: Error :(
channel.description:
well i followed this guide perfectly. or so i thought > http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=2807 <(tell me if im not aloud to post link and i will remove)
[code] Player.java:769: cannot find symbol symbol : method isMedHelm(int) location: class Item if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEqu ipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isMedHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat])) {
^ client.java:14230: cannot find symbol symbol : variable medhelm location: class Item for (int i = 0; i < Item.medhelm.length; i++) { ^ client.java:14231: cannot find symbol symbol : variable medhelm location: class Item if (item == Item.medhelm[i]) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
what do i do? :( i'll attempt to fix some of the errors. help if ya can please ;)

item.title: Error :(
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

i dont understand how it cant find “.” err… this guide is a bit stupid? half the things say MedHelm the others say Med i used tried the guide perfect and it didnt work. then tried to change the medhelm to med, didnt work, changed the other half of med to medhelm’s and it still doesnt work… am i just trying an impossible thing here?

Read full topic

item.title: Error :(

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

try, just med…

Like…

if (!Item.isFullHelm(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && !Item.isFullMask(playerEqu
ipment[playerHat]) && !Item.med(playerEquipment[playerHat])) {

If that doesn’t work… You havent added it correctly in item.java
